talk.author: did:plc:3ep5ijm7and35pjwp5ngvpe4
talk.utter: If you want to make the assertion that sex workers were everywhere first, you can, and I am also not arguing against protections. But I don't think that sex workers "make this site what it is". I don't believe that's the core focus of the site or what most people are looking for when they visit.
